summary: We offer both long-term and short-term healthcare jobs
title: We offer both long-term and short-term healthcare jobs
body: We offer both long-term and short-term healthcare jobs which can be of contractual or full-time in nature. The range of work contract can vary from 8 hours to 5 years. In order to ensure that only qualified and skilled professionals are appointed in the facilities, we first screen the candidates to verify their professional expertise before sending them for the placement.  Our vision is to offer professional and highly comprehensive staffing solutions to all our clients. read more visit : https://goo.gl/J4kjrb

summary: Can We Share Unheard Voices Like Joe Strummer?
title: Can We Share Unheard Voices Like Joe Strummer?
body:
Can We Share Unheard Voices Like Joe Strummer?

Bear with me on this. I want to take you back to the early 80s with me, in New York City. I’ve been listening to a podcast series on Spotify, The Story of the Clash, and during an episode a couple of weeks back, they were recalling the series of concerts the band played in NYC after the release of Sandinista, which was an interesting album in that the band brought in about every type of musical…

View On WordPress

summary: Granuloma Inguinale (Donovanosis): Symptoms, Stages, Causes & Treatment
title: Granuloma Inguinale (Donovanosis): Symptoms, Stages, Causes & Treatment
body:
Granuloma inguinale is a genital ulcerative disease caused by the bacterium Klebsiella granulomatis. That is, Granuloma inguinale is a sexually transmitted infection (STI). Also known as donovanosis, the infection causes lesions in the genital and anal regions . The STI is characterised by pain-free genital ulcers that look like the pox. The infection is mostly found in sub-tropical and tropical regions and is rarely reported in developed countries. In some of the developing countries, such as India, Papua New Guinea, and the Caribbean, the infection is regarded as an endemic , .

The bacterium Klebsiella granulomatis infects the skin around the genitals and causes ulcers which result in the destruction of the skin around the affected area. This destructive nature of the infection elevates the risk of getting affected by other pathogenic microbes.

Granuloma inguinale is infectious, that is, it can spread from one person to other . It is mostly spread through the means of vaginal or anal intercourse and rare cases of infection through oral sex have been reported. However, anal intercourse is suspected to be the most frequent source of infection. About 50 per cent of the affected (men and women) have developed lesions in the anal region .

Studies have revealed that men are most likely to be affected by the infection than women and commonly occurs in people aged between 20 to 40. Most of the cases of the STI reported are in people who have travelled to places that are at a high risk of the infection . And, a very small proportion of people may be infected through direct, non-sexual contact (skin to skin).

Symptoms Of Granuloma Inguinale

The common signs indicating the development of the infection are small, painless nodules (pimple like) which develops into an open and fleshy lesion. The infection develops in the genital area and in some cases, mouth sores can also develop. This aggravates until the infected tissue gets mutilated and the infection will continue to latch onto other tissues , .

Apart from this, the symptoms of the sexually transmitted disease can be described in line with the stages of Granuloma inguinale.

Stages Of Granuloma Inguinale

The signs of the infection develop at a slow pace. That is, once the individual comes in contact with the bacteria it will take 7 to 10 days to experience the symptoms. Within a period of 12 weeks, the symptoms will be at their maximum capacity .

  • Stage one: In the initial stage, the small nodule will spread to the surrounding tissue. The affected tissues will be lost and the area will turn pink (or a very light red). The small bumps found around the anus and genitals turn into raised red nodules with a velvety texture. The nodules will be painless, however, injuring them can cause bleeding.
  • Stage two: By now, the bacteria will begin to destroy the skin and cause shallow ulcers that will spread from the genitals and anus to the thighs and lower abdomen. The ulcers may have a foul smell and will be lined with granulated tissue.
  • Stage three: Upon reaching the third stage, the infection will become deep and the ulcers will turn into morph tissue.

Causes Of Granuloma Inguinale

The infection is caused by the Klebsiella granulomatis bacteria. One can contract the infection by having vaginal or anal intercourse with an infected partner. In very rare cases, it has spread through oral sex. Apart from these, it can spread from a mother to a child during delivery .

Complications Of Granuloma Inguinale

  • Loss of skin colour in the genital area
  • Genital damage and scarring
  • Permanent genital swelling due to scarring
  • Cancer in the sore
  • Narrowing of the vagina, anus or urethra
  • Damage to the bones or bowel, if the bacteria spread through the blood to other sites

It is often difficult to diagnose the infection in its early stage due to the slow development of the ulcers.

If the ulcers do not heal after a month, your doctor will advise a skin biopsy of the lesions called the punch biopsy. Under this one, the doctor will remove a small area of the ulcer with a circular blade and will be tested for the presence of Klebsiella granulomatis bacteria . In some cases, scrapings of the lesions are used to detect the presence of the bacteria.

The diagnosis will also include blood tests to check the presence of other sexually transmitted diseases , .

Treatment For Granuloma Inguinale

Antibiotics such as azithromycin, doxycycline, ciprofloxacin, erythromycin, and trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole are used. The antibiotics will be used for a long period of time, until the sores are completely healed, and depending on the length of time since infection and the stage of infection. Most of the antibiotics are prescribed for a period of three weeks, however, some may take more time to heal the ulcer .

If the ulcers are painful, the doctor will advise for painkillers .

A follow-up examination is essential, as the sexually transmitted infection can reappear even if the lesions have gone down completely .

Prevention Of Granuloma Inguinale

  • Using condoms for vaginal and anal sex significantly reduces the risk of the infection and sexually transmitted diseases .
  • Avoid sex with individuals who have a visible genital ulcer or sore.
  • Before travelling to a developing country, run a thorough check on the diseases that are prevalent there, and adopt suitable preventive measures .

Also Read:

Gonorrhea: Everything You Need To Know About This Common STD

Salmonella Infection: Symptoms, Causes, Diagnosis & Treatment

Skin Grafting: Types, Procedure And Complications

summary: I can’t tell you how motivating seeing success is for me! But what I’ve also been realizing is that the battle never ends. Even...
body: I can’t tell you how motivating seeing success is for me! But what I’ve also been realizing is that the battle never ends. Even though I’m now a solid small (which I never thought I would be) after having worn large for so long - I have to continue the work and the effort. Now that I’m small I don’t magically get to eat fast food again or drink fraps at Starbucks. I must continue every day to make healthy choices, fuel my body with healthy carbs, proteins, fats. I must continue to priortize an active lifestyle. The work doesn’t stop and I wouldn’t have it any other way.

I must continue to priortize an active lifestyle. The work doesn’t stop and I wouldn’t have it any other way.

Now that I’m small I don’t magically get to eat fast food again or drink fraps at Starbucks. I must continue every day to make healthy choices, fuel my body with healthy carbs, proteins, fats. I must continue to priortize an active lifestyle. The work doesn’t stop and I wouldn’t have it any other way.

summary: Bad news, hipsters: Beards carry 'more germs than dog fur,' study claims
title: Bad news, hipsters: Beards carry 'more germs than dog fur,' study claims
body:
Beards carry more germs than dog fur, a new Swiss study suggests, but some call it “irrational prejudice.”

Read more from CTV Health News https://www.ctvnews.ca/health/bad-news-hipsters-beards-carry-more-germs-than-dog-fur-study-claims-1.4383614

blog.name: byronrashie
blog.title: Byron Rashie
blog.description:
Join us as we travel to the most beautiful locations on Australia's Easterly coast and beyond... if you're into Freedom in the Sun we've got you covered... Byron Bay’s infamous sun, sand and surf inspired a revolutionary rashie that features a built-in hood to help protect the upper body, face and neck from the sun and wind.
This patent-pending design provides UPF50+ sun protection for lovers of water sports such as swimming, surfing, kayaking and stand-up paddle boarding. We're adding to our range every season at www.byronrashie.com.au.

summary: Ok, maybe that would be the most silly question anyone has asked you but I treat you as everyone "big sis" here, so that's why...
question: Ok, maybe that would be the most silly question anyone has asked you but I treat you as everyone "big sis" here, so that's why I'm asking xdd How to overcome a fear of getting drunk, without using drastic measures like forever abstinence of the alcohol? I recently turned legal age in my country to drink and I would really love to drink with my friends sometimes but I'm really scared that I got drunk and do something really stupid (or extreme or dangerous or something like that)
answer:
Part 2: everyone around me is telling me that’s healthy to know your limits and even my family said that if i want to test it, I can do it at home but I’m so scared of being drunk that I’m even scared to do it at home with family around me (mostly because I’m scared that I would tell them all my secrets while drunk or something like that).Is there any way to overcome this fear or am I destined to be abstinent forever with this attitude?

Hey there love, 

Yay, I’m hereby everyone’s big sis. I love it!

Onto the ask, now, I’m actually one of the few that chose to abstain from alcohol for the most part for many reasons, and the fear of embarrassing myself in front of everyone and not remembering it the next day is one of them. 

The thing is, our society puts a lot of pressure on the fact that, in order to have a good time, you have to have at least some amount of booze in your system. As if the only time you can have a great time is if you’re hammered. I’ve found that quite repulsive, actually.

If it actually tasted good, then that’s one thing, but most booze tastes like nail-polish remover and it’s not really worth the hangover and the embarrassment. But that’s just me. You do you.

If you don’t feel safe testing your drinking threshold in front of your family, then is there a trusted friend?

Even if you’re lightweight, and you drink a little bit of something with low alcohol quantity, you’re not going to be so wasted that you’re not in control of your actions. Maybe it’s not best to be driving because your motor skills won’t be as sharp as they are when you are sober, but you’ll still be in control of your decision making. 

If you limit yourself to one glass (or two if it’s not a strong drink) then you should be fine. 

And if you’re still not sure if you’re ready to drink, then don’t, at least until you feel ready. It doesn’t really have any benefits and so many successful people are toning down their alcohol consumption because they realize how harmful it is for you anyways. 

💋

summary: Believe it or not, but the BIGGEST aspect of weightloss and more importantly overall health, wellness and fitness is REST! When...
caption:
Believe it or not, but the BIGGEST aspect of weightloss and more importantly overall health, wellness and fitness is REST! When you overwork the body (especially when coupled with under eating) your body tries hard to conserve precious energy (yes, in the form of calories) and will burn less and less at each workout. This will also overwork the adrenal glands. Adrenal fatigue (or worse, exhaustion) will make you age at a MUCH faster rate than otherwise, and prevent any sustainable weight loss along the way. The key is to build muscle first, then preserve that muscle while burning fat and keeping healthy as you go. This is the magic recipe for a long life and a fit body. I specialize in helping people achieve this in their own chosen lifestyles. summary: I Need To Go To Alcohol Rehab. What Do I Do? - Attention Trust
title: I Need To Go To Alcohol Rehab. What Do I Do? - Attention Trust
excerpt: You you Should go to an alcohol rehab centre, but you need to tell the people around you that you love that you have a problem.
